page.title: 11SOCIAL CONCERNS-HOUSING
page.content: People come to live in Offords and Great Paxton because they are quiet,peaceful villages,close to the A1 road for those who need to travel. There is quite a lot of movement within the Great Paxton mainly due to job changes or promotions. There are often houses for sale as people who move live on the estate.The older village houses do not change ownership so often.There is not so much movement in the Offords as people from these villages work more locally.The Offords have a shop, post office,garage, village hall and Churches.There is a large fruit depot in Offord which employs people.
